entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
